Plot: A dog that helped US Marines in Afghanistan returns to the U.S. and is adopted by his handler's family after suffering a traumatic experience.
Title: Max
Actors: Thomas Haden Church, Josh Wiggins, Luke Kleintank, Lauren Graham
tomatoConsensus: Max has good intentions and tries to hearken back to classic family-friendly features, but its disjointed, manipulative plot overwhelms the efforts of its talented human and canine stars.
